udai

Class ImageManipulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • udai.ImageManipulation

  • public class ImageManipulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Original source is credited to the UDAI team. The file has been modified to achieved functionalities needed for Hatalskan. ImageManipulation identifies the locations of concentric circles placed on an image file, given a .asc template file. A .asc file depicts the fields where marks are expected.
